issue.title: ign tools echo command unable to output data from custom Protobuf messages.

content.raw:
@caguero never mind about the topic not echoing! Already got it to work:
```sh
pressure: 100902.8
temperature: 287.92102
pressure_alt: 35.247627

pressure: 100903.9
temperature: 287.92102
pressure_alt: 35.339039

pressure: 100904.24
temperature: 287.92102
pressure_alt: 35.368294
```

Though the problem persists regarding the `Invalid proto descriptor`.
